name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_taskDisplayName
description: Standard process model task display naming convention
sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  concat(
    ri!taskName,
    " - ",
    ri!keyPvName,
    ": ",
    rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: if(
        count(
          ri!pvIdentifier
        ) > 1,
        joinarray(
          ri!pvIdentifier,
          ", "
        ),
        ri!pvIdentifier
      ),
      replacementValue: "null"
    )
  )
)
